original_text: And he built the inner courtyard of three courses of dressed stone and one course of trimmed cedar beams.
korean_text: 또 다듬은 돌 세 켜와 백향목 두꺼운 판자 한 켜로 둘러 안뜰을 만들었더라

sentences.original_text: And he built the inner courtyard
of three courses of dressed stone
and one course of trimmed cedar beams
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다듬은 백향목 들보 한 겹으로 만들었습니다
